title: 67 - Live At The Egyptian Room
description:
Live from Indianapolis' The Egyptian Room, it's an all new My Favorite Murder! This week, Karen and Georgia cover serial killers Belle Gunness and Herb Baumeister.

Follow along with the visuals from this week's episode here by scrolling through the images as seen originally on stage @ https://instagram.com/p/BTrZwhol1uC/
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
